dict.string: FitDad Nudge needs access to your calendar to find the perfect workout gaps in your busy schedule.
FitDad Nudge needs access to your calendar to find the perfect workout gaps in your busy schedule.
FitDad Nudge would like to read your health data to track your fitness progress.
FitDad Nudge would like to save your workout data to Apple Health.
FitDad Nudge will send you smart notifications when it's the perfect time for a quick workout.
FitDad Nudge needs camera access to scan QR codes for social features.
FitDad Nudge uses motion data to automatically detect when you've completed a workout.
